alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and northeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Gadsden, north central Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida and southwestern Decatur Counties in southwestern Georgia through 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 502 PM EDT/402 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Chattahoochee to 8 miles southwest of Midway. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Midway, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Gretna, Rock Bluff, Littman, Juniper, Douglas City, Florence, Scotland, Rosedale, Santa Clara, Shady Rest, Quincy Airport, Wetumpka, Sawdust, Lake Talquin and Mount Pleasant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
